extension.name: Settings form
extension.description: A standard settings form you can subclass.
extension.comments: I blatantly stole this from https://github.com/eileenmcnaughton/nz.co.fuzion.civixero/blob/master/CRM/Civixero/Form/XeroSettings.php which is fine since it's AGPL :-) Credits to [Eileen](https://github.com/eileenmcnaughton).
